sentence.Network_en: He took a spoonful of the stew and ate it.
You beg him to try just one spoonful, and he clamps his mouth shut.
sentence.Network_cn: 你求他就尝一匙，可他就是不张嘴。

sentence.Network_en: I shouldn't have put that extra spoonful of curry powder in this meal, but I suppose we can all be wise after the event.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不应该在这顿饭里多放那一汤匙的咖喱粉, 我想我们都是事后才明白的.

entry.def: You can refer to an amount of food resting on a spoon as a spoonful of food.

example.ex: He took a spoonful of the stew and ate it.

means.word_mean: 1. as much as a spoon will hold;

auth_sentence.content: Place a spoonful of lime clotted cream on top.
auth_sentence.res_content: Place a spoonful of lime clotted cream on top.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Place a spoonful of lime clotted cream on top.

auth_sentence.content: Serve with a spoonful of vanilla ice cream.
auth_sentence.res_content: Serve with a spoonful of vanilla ice cream.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Serve with a spoonful of vanilla ice cream.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"有……的;充满……的"; 2. 表名词,"满,量"

stems_affixes.word_buile: bane毒药,祸害+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.有害的,致祸的
cheer愉快,欢呼+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.愉快的,高兴的
faith信任,信念+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.守信的,忠实的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 健忘的,不注意的,疏忽的
stems_affixes.word_buile: forget忘记+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.健忘的,不注意的,疏忽的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 果实结得多的,多产的,富有成效的
stems_affixes.word_buile: fruit果实+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.果实结得多的,多产的,富有成效的
grace优美+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.优美的
grate=grat感激+ful多……的→adj.[to,for]感激的;感谢的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给人希望的,抱有希望的
stems_affixes.word_buile: hope希望+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.给人希望的,抱有希望的
power力量+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.强大的,有力的
rue悔恨+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.后悔的,遗憾的
shame耻辱+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.可耻的;不道德的
success成功,胜利+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.成功的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 深思的,有思想性的,体贴的,关切的
stems_affixes.word_buile: thought思考,想法+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.深思的,有思想性的,体贴的,关切的
will意志+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.任性的,故意的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令人惊奇的,奇妙的,极好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: wonder奇迹+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.令人惊奇的,奇妙的,极好的
hand手+ful满,量→n.一把;少数;一小撮

sentences.en: He put two spoonfuls of sugar in his tea.
